title: Enhancing CS Competencies and Practical Skills: Teacher Certification Training for Strengthening Online Instructional Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: They can apply at least three interactive elements when designing online lessons.
They can utilize at least two types of digital content creation tools suited to the characteristics of science subjects.
They can design and implement at least one online assessment method that enhances learner engagement.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
